text: This phone battery lasts forever, no complaints here.
Oh wow, the phone dies in 2 hours… perfect.
Movie was solid, kept me interested all the way.
Sure, the movie was exciting… if watching grass grow excites you.
The delivery was super fast, got it next day.
Yep, the package arrived in one day… and by one day, I mean a week.
OMG this camera is sooo good, totally recommend it!
LOL the camera is 'soo good', if blurry pics are your thing.
The concert was amazing, the band killed it.
Yeah, the band killed it… my eardrums though, not so much.
This laptop runs everything I need smoothly.
Wow, this laptop crashes every 5 mins… love that.
Super easy recipe, turned out perfect first try.
Sure, super easy recipe… if failing counts as cooking.
Movie acting was incredible, really believable.
Incredible acting… as believable as a talking dog.
Delivery guy was friendly and helpful.
Delivery guy was friendly… but somehow broke my door.
Love this jacket, fits perfectly and comfy.
Love this jacket… fits like a potato sack.
Game graphics were stunning, very immersive.
Graphics were stunning… in a retro 90s kinda way.
Ordered the bread, super fresh and tasty.
Ordered the bread… tasted like cardboard, yum.
Had a fun night with friends, laughed a lot.
Fun night… mostly laughing at how boring it was.
This vacuum sucks up everything, very efficient.
Yeah, this vacuum sucks… just like the old one.
OMG the new phone app is sooo handy, love it!
Handy app… if crashing constantly counts as handy.
The film’s soundtrack was beautiful, fit every scene.
Soundtrack was beautiful… until the instruments started off-key.
Fast shipping, product exactly as described.
Product arrived fast… but it was totally wrong, nice one.
Baked cookies came out perfect, everyone loved them.
Cookies came out perfect… perfect for the trash.
The show was hilarious, really made me laugh.
Hilarious show… as funny as watching paint dry.
This blender works like a charm, super smooth.
Blender works like a charm… charm of chaos, that is.
The TV series kept me hooked, binge-watched in one day.
Kept me hooked… mostly by making me question my life choices.
Really comfy shoes, can wear all day without pain.
Comfy shoes… if walking on nails is your thing.
Laptop runs games smoothly, no lag at all.
Runs games smoothly… except for that tiny crash every hour.
Recipe was super easy to follow, turned out great.
Recipe easy to follow… if you like failed disasters.
Concert was amazing, loved every song.
Concert amazing… mostly because I could finally leave.
This phone case fits perfectly, love the design.
Phone case fits perfectly… if you like it hanging off the edges.
Game was fun and challenging, kept me entertained.
Game fun… if frustration counts as entertainment.
Pizza was hot and tasty, exactly what I wanted.
Pizza hot… mostly because the oven exploded, yum.
The movie was emotional, really moved me.
Emotional movie… I cried, but mostly from boredom.
Shoes arrived quickly, fit perfectly.
Shoes arrived quickly… fit perfectly if you like stubbed toes.
The camera quality is amazing, pictures come out sharp.
Camera quality amazing… if blurry is your thing.
The laptop battery lasts a really long time, very happy.
Laptop battery lasts… just long enough to die mid-essay, perfect.
The novel was gripping, couldn’t put it down.
Gripping novel… mostly because I kept checking the clock.
Bread was fresh and delicious, everyone loved it.
Bread fresh… mostly because it was rock hard, yum.
Game controls are smooth and intuitive, really enjoy it.
Game controls smooth… if smashing buttons randomly counts as smooth.
The film’s acting was superb, very believable.
Acting superb… if overacting counts as superb.
Package arrived on time, exactly as promised.
Package on time… mostly because the delivery guy forgot it first.
